title: torch.distributed.init_process_group() init_method arg needs better docs
body_html:
At the moment, the documentation for the init_method argument just says that env is the default, but doesn't specify what valid arguments are, nor where to find that out. There is a distributed tutorial that describes this:
http://pytorch.org/tutorials/intermediate/dist_tuto.html

Please provide a link to that tutorial, if that is the official documentation on what init_methods are supported. Otherwise, this function should document the valid options.
body_text:

Please provide a link to that tutorial, if that is the official documentation on what init_methods are supported.  Otherwise, this function should document the valid options.
body:
At the moment, the documentation for the init_method argument just says that env is the default, but doesn't specify what valid arguments are, nor where to find that out.   There is a distributed tutorial that describes this:
http://pytorch.org/tutorials/intermediate/dist_tuto.html 

Please provide a link to that tutorial, if that is the official documentation on what init_methods are supported.  Otherwise, this function should document the valid options.
